##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3682.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3730.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3738.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3766.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

      capabilities: {}

    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3775.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline3784.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext: {}

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN

        - ALL
  initContainers:

        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_baseline392.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_baseline3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_baseline3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CAP_CHOWN
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted01.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:

  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted0160.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod

  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted027.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted099.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

  namespace: default

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - ALL

kind: Pod

  containers:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1

      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted158.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

  namespace: default

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        drop:

metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities: {}
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_RAWIO
        - SYS_PACCT
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_NICE
        - SYS_RESOURCE
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_TTY_CONFIG
        - MKNOD
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - AUDIT_CONTROL
        - MAC_OVERRIDE
        - MAC_ADMIN
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYSLOG
        - CHOWN
        - NET_RAW
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - DAC_READ_SEARCH
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - SETGID
        - SETUID
        - LINUX_IMMUTABLE
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - NET_BROADCAST
        - IPC_LOCK
        - IPC_OWNER
        - SYS_CHROOT
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_BOOT
        - LEASE
        - SETFCAP
        - WAKE_ALARM
        - BLOCK_SUSPEND
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_RAWIO
        - SYS_PACCT
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_NICE
        - SYS_RESOURCE
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_TTY_CONFIG
        - MKNOD
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - AUDIT_CONTROL
        - MAC_OVERRIDE
        - MAC_ADMIN
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYSLOG
        - CHOWN
        - NET_RAW
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - DAC_READ_SEARCH
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - SETGID
        - SETUID
        - LINUX_IMMUTABLE
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - NET_BROADCAST
        - IPC_LOCK
        - IPC_OWNER
        - SYS_CHROOT
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_BOOT
        - LEASE
        - SETFCAP
        - WAKE_ALARM
        - BLOCK_SUSPEND
  securityContext:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_RAWIO
        - SYS_PACCT
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_NICE
        - SYS_RESOURCE
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_TTY_CONFIG
        - MKNOD
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - AUDIT_CONTROL
        - MAC_OVERRIDE
        - MAC_ADMIN
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYSLOG
        - CHOWN
        - NET_RAW
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - DAC_READ_SEARCH
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - SETGID
        - SETUID
        - LINUX_IMMUTABLE
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - NET_BROADCAST
        - IPC_LOCK
        - IPC_OWNER
        - SYS_CHROOT
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_BOOT
        - LEASE
        - SETFCAP
        - WAKE_ALARM
        - BLOCK_SUSPEND
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_RAWIO
        - SYS_PACCT
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_NICE
        - SYS_RESOURCE
        - SYS_TIME
        - SYS_TTY_CONFIG
        - MKNOD
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - AUDIT_CONTROL
        - MAC_OVERRIDE
        - MAC_ADMIN
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYSLOG
        - CHOWN
        - NET_RAW
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - DAC_READ_SEARCH
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - SETGID
        - SETUID
        - LINUX_IMMUTABLE
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - NET_BROADCAST

        - IPC_OWNER
        - SYS_CHROOT
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_BOOT
        - LEASE
        - SETFCAP
        - WAKE_ALARM
        - BLOCK_SUSPEND

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN

        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN

        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SYS_CHROOT

        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - ALL

##### FILE: capabilities_restricted354.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE

        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE

        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE

        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD

        - SETUID

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capabilities_restricted3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: capabilities_restricted3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        add:
        - AUDIT_WRITE
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - FSETID
        - KILL
        - MKNOD
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        - SETFCAP
        - SETGID
        - SETPCAP
        - SETUID
        - SYS_CHROOT
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/capability-drop-and-add:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: capability-drop-and-add
  name: capability-drop-and-add
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - while :; do sleep 10; done
    image: ubuntu:22.04
    name: ubuntu
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - CHOWN
        - DAC_OVERRIDE
        - FOWNER
        - SETGID
        - SETUID
        - NET_BIND_SERVICE
        drop:
        - all

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to baremetal-operator-system/Deployment/baremetal-operator-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
    webhook: metal3-io-v1alpha1-baremetalhost
  name: baremetal-operator-controller-manager
  namespace: baremetal-operator-system
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
        webhook: metal3-io-v1alpha1-baremetalhost
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metrics-addr=127.0.0.1:8085
        - --enable-leader-election
        command:
        - /baremetal-operator
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ironic
        image: quay.io/metal3-io/baremetal-operator
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 9440
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: webhook-server
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 9440
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsUser: 65532
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/k8s-webhook-server/serving-certs
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --secure-listen-address=0.0.0.0:8443
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8085/
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --v=10
        image: gcr.io/kubebuilder/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.8.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: baremetal-operator-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: bmo-webhook-server-cert

      "schedulerStrategy": "spreadout"
    }
kind: ConfigMap

  labels:
    app: csi-carina-node
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
    class: carina
    helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
    release: my-release
  name: my-release-csi-config
  namespace: default

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/csi-carina-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
    class: carina
    helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
    release: my-release
  name: csi-carina-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
        class: carina
        helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
        release: my-release
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=15s
        - --leader-election
        - --worker-threads=40
        - --extra-create-metadata=true
        - --strict-topology=true
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-provisioner:v2.2.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-provisioner
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - -csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - -v=5
        - -leader-election
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - -handle-volume-inuse-error=false
        - --timeout=150s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-resizer:v1.5.0
        name: csi-resizer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --probe-timeout=3s
        - --health-port=29602
        - --v=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/livenessprobe:v2.7.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --cert-dir=/certs
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --webhook-addr=:8443
        command:
        - carina-controller
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:v0.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-carina-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/carina/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
      hostNetwork: false
      serviceAccountName: carina-csi-controller
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/controlplane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: socket-dir
      - configMap:
          name: my-release-csi-config
        name: config
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: my-release-apiserver-cert

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/MutatingWebhookConfiguration/my-release-hook:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  name: my-release-hook
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  - v1beta1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: 
    service:
      name: my-release-controller
      namespace: default
      path: /pod/mutate
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  matchPolicy: Exact
  name: pod-hook.carina.storage.io
  namespaceSelector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: carina.storage.io/webhook
      operator: NotIn
      values:
      - ignore
  objectSelector: {}
  reinvocationPolicy: Never
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    resources:
    - pods
  sideEffects: NoneOnDryRun
  timeoutSeconds: 30
